items.title: Are you a teacher?
items.comment: A yes/no question asking if someone is a teacher. The particle '吗' (ma) is used to form yes/no questions.

items.title: Yes, I am.
items.comment: A formal way to confirm a statement.

items.title: No, I'm not.
items.comment: A straightforward way to deny a statement.

items.title: I'm not a teacher, I'm a student.
items.pinyin: wǒ bù shì lǎoshī, wǒ shì xuéshēng.
items.pronounce: waw boo shrr laow-shrr, waw shrr shweh-shung.
items.comment: Used to clarify that you are a student, not a teacher.
